channel.title: Several Confusing Questions
channel.description:
Alright, on my server I would like to know how to:
- Give Admins/Mods/Donators different Crowns/Badges. - Make text colors and effects work (wave:white: etc) - Change the default Theme/Skin that the client opens up in - Add buttons in the client to do different functions, etc. - Replace the RuneScape logo at the loading/login screen to my own logo - Move or remove the flames at the loading/login screen
Does anyone know how to do ANY of that?
Thanks so much guys!

item.title: Several Confusing Questions
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

_TM is right. All of these are client sided.
Plus there’s some tutorials for those in the Private Server Client Hacking section

Read full topic

item.title: Several Confusing Questions
item.dc:creator: @Kahl Kahl
item.description:
@Kahl wrote:

Ive checked all the files of server side and client side.

And I thought some of my questions were server side and some were client side, thats why I asked here. Does anyone know the answer to any of these?

Read full topic

item.title: Several Confusing Questions
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

  1. Client sided
  2. Check your chat packets in your server, if not your client.

Everything else) Post this in the client section

Read full topic

item.title: Several Confusing Questions
item.dc:creator: @Kahl Kahl
item.description:
@Kahl wrote:

Alright, on my server I would like to know how to:

  • Give Admins/Mods/Donators different Crowns/Badges.
  • Make text colors and effects work (wave:white: etc)
  • Change the default Theme/Skin that the client opens up in
  • Add buttons in the client to do different functions, etc.
  • Replace the RuneScape logo at the loading/login screen to my own logo
  • Move or remove the flames at the loading/login screen

Does anyone know how to do ANY of that?
